ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of an auditor of the Bank of Canada for fiscal years 2024 to 2028.
PrecisOrder appointing PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS LLP as AUDITOR of the BANK OF CANADA for the period from January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2028.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order appointing PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS LLP as AUDITOR of the BANK OF CANADA for the period from January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2028.
